entry.title: We're all about leveling up! This is a pretty exciting update from our S1 partners @ConsenSys
entry.summary: We're all about leveling up! This is a pretty exciting update from our S1 partners @ConsenSys ConsenSys Diligence: Today we published the Diligence Security Tooling Guide to help devs across Web3 level up their smart contract security! 🥳🚀 The guide features 22 tools from @GnosisDAO @trufflesuite @OpenZeppelin @TenderlyApp and more, and when to use each at every stage of development.👇

entry.summary: RT DevNTell Random thought 🤔 What if we did a demo day? Think of it like DevNTell of today but on a grander scale held yearly/semi yearly that gives a set of builders/teams a chance to pitch their products to the @developer_dao in a competition style with potential prizing What say you?

entry.title: RT zainabhasan.eth 🦇🔊: The Internet is a network of independent computers connecting to share data (whether to read, write, store, or all). Simi...
entry.summary: RT zainabhasan.eth 🦇🔊 The Internet is a network of independent computers connecting to share data (whether to read, write, store, or all). Similarly, @cosmos connects separate blockchains. As the internet uses HTTP protocol, Cosmos uses IBC protocol. Read in detail! https://xord.com/research/cosmos-an-architectural-guide/
